content.text:
Here are the files in the current directory:

**Main files:**
- CHANGELOG.md, CLAUDE.md, LICENSE, PLAN.md, README.md, README_CAPTURE.md
- mix.exs, mix.lock
- capture_cli_direct.sh, capture_cli_output.exs

**Directories:**
- _build/ - Elixir build artifacts
- deps/ - Dependencies
- docs/ - Documentation (ARCHITECTURE.md, DEV_SETUP.md, README.md, ROADMAP.md, VISION.md)
- lib/ - Source code (claude_code.ex and claude_code/ with cli.ex, message.ex, session.ex)
- priv/ - Private assets (plts/)
- test/ - Test files and fixtures
